text: Karel Kuklík (March 7, 1937 - August 18, 2019) was a Czech photographer. He was born in Prague. He was one of the representatives of Informel in Czech fine art photography. He was an artist influenced by abstract and surrealist. In 2000 he co-founded the photographic group Český dřevák. Kuklík died on August 18, 2019 in Prague at the age of 82.Zemřel fotograf Karel Kuklík ==References== Category:Photographers Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Prague
title: Karel Kuklík
